instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, carrot, celery, and garlic and salt until the vegetables are tender.
Add the ground beef to the pan and cook until it's browned and cooked through.
Pour in the red wine and let it simmer until the wine has reduced by half.
Add the canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and let it simmer for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
In the meantime, cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Once the spaghetti is cooked, drain it and add it to the pan with the sauce. Toss well to combine.
Serve the spaghetti bolognese with a sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese on top.
